May 12 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - SMALLER RELATED PARTY TRANSACTION *AVEVA-ON 11 MAY, ENTERED DEAL TO SELL ACQUIS SOFTWARE, TERMIS SOFTWARE & WATER LOSS MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE BUSINESSES TO SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC FOR £2.6 MILLION


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 12-MAY-202106:00:02 GMT
